link.description: The URL link to the article. Can be a string or null.

published_date.description: The publication date of the article as a date-time string (ISO 8601), or null if not provided.

title.description: The title of the article. Can be a string or null.

description.description: The description of the article, as described by the RSS feed.

author.description: The author of the article. Can be a string or null.

source_id.description: The source identifier, stored as a unique string. REFERENCES unique_id field in article_source_schema.

self_reported_feed_title.description: The feed title provided by the source; defaults to 'Unknown' if not available.
